Text_English: That has no sense!
Text_Spanish: ¡Eso no tiene sentido!

Text_English: That has nothing outstanding
Text_Spanish: No tiene nada del otro mundo

Text_English: Nothing to tell
Text_Spanish: Nada que decir

Text_English: I see no reason for doing that
Text_Spanish: No veo razón para hacer eso

Text_English: I don't get it - Too complicated
Text_Spanish: No lo pillo - Es demasiado complicado

Text_English: I already thought that
Text_Spanish: Ya le di una vuelta a aquello

Text_English: That is a great idea!
Text_Spanish: Es una genial idea!

Text_English: This mistery is a hard puzzle to solve
Text_Spanish: Este misterio es un gran rompecabezas que resolver

Text_English: Victim seems to be poisoned. Could be poison is still in kitchen or fest room?
Text_Spanish: La víctima parece haber sido envenenada. Puede ser que el veneno esté aún en la cocina o el gran salón?

Text_English: Victim is definitely gone! They all claim he was poisoned
Text_Spanish: La víctima definitivamente ha sucumbido! Todos dicen que ha sido envenenado

Text_English: I'm innocent! I just brought all food this morning! no one more complained
Text_Spanish: Soy inocente! Solo traje la comida esta mañana! Nadie más se ha quejado

Text_English: That! Is what you'll need to prove in court when they come after you
Text_Spanish: Eso! Es lo que tendrás que demostrar en un juicio! En cuanto entren a por ti

Text_English: I have enough time to demonstrate my innocence
Text_Spanish: Tengo tiempo suficiente para demostrar mi inocencia

Text_English: I wish you in jail
Text_Spanish: Ojalá te vea en prisión

Text_English: Don't go too far. They are comming after you
Text_Spanish: No te vayas muy lejos. Ya vienen a por ti

Text_English: I won't move! for sure
Text_Spanish: No me moveré! Seguro!

Text_English: There will be a court process and I am the only suspicious
Text_Spanish: Habrá un juicio y soy el único sospechoso

Text_English: By the moment I see the only solution is to flee
Text_Spanish: Por el momento solo veo la opción de huir

Text_English: I need to ensure what's the situation before leaving
Text_Spanish: Necesito asegurarme de cuál es la situación antes de irme

Text_English: It's not the best idea to flee from main door as guards are already comming for me
Text_Spanish: No es la mejor idea huir por la puerta principal ya que seguramente estén buscándome los guardias ahora mismo

Text_English: I always wanted one of these
Text_Spanish: Siempre quise una de estas

Text_English: I don't wish any bad for you but you are in problems. I hope I can help you
Text_Spanish: No te deseo ningún mal chico. Pero estás bien metido en problemas. Espero poder ayudarte

Text_English: How am I supposed to demonstrate I didn't do it?
Text_Spanish: Como se supone que voy a demostrar que no fui yo?

Text_English: Well... I guess you need to find out what did cause this and who
Text_Spanish: Bueno... supongo que tendrás que averiguar qué causó esto y quién fue

Text_English: How could I run out from here?
Text_Spanish: Como podría escapar de aquí?

Text_English: Well... I guess the kitchen is faced to a garden which is not commonly transited
Text_Spanish: Bueno... supongo que la cocina da con un jardín que es poco transitado

Text_English: I'm sure THIS substance has something to do
Text_Spanish: Estoy seguro de que esta sustancia tuvo algo que ver

Text_English: Hmm... Interesting. Where did you take it?
Text_Spanish: Hmm.. Interesante. Donde la encontraste?

Text_English: It was spread on the hams served this night
Text_Spanish: Estaba esparcido en los jamones que se sirvieron esta noche

Text_English: I'm happy for you. You are one step closer to get that one
Text_Spanish: Me alegro por ti. Estás un paso más cerca de cazarlo

Text_English: If you want to go. Take this key. It's an old one from this house. It can open the window... and I suppose nothing else. As they changed almost all keyholes last year
Text_Spanish: Si quieres marchar. Toma esta llave. Es una de las antiguas de esta casa. Esta abre la ventana y no sé si alguna cosa más. Ya que cambiaron las cerraduras de casi toda la casa el año pasado

Text_English: I hope it lasts enough time on spoon
Text_Spanish: Espero que aguante suficiente tiempo en la cuchara

Text_English: You already shown it. I think it's time to go
Text_Spanish: Ya me la enseñaste. Creo que es hora de que te marches

Text_English: Tadaaa!
Text_Spanish: Tan fácil como eso!

Text_English: I always had a builder within
Text_Spanish: Siempre llevé un albañil dentro
